title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Clutch Jimmy G, Russ/Seattle Divorce (?) and Rodgers Media Beef, Packers Playoffs, NFC North HC Firings w/ Tyler Dunne
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Clutch Jimmy G, Russ/Seattle Divorce (?) and Rodgers Media Beef, Packers Playoffs, NFC North HC Firings w/ Tyler Dunne
description:
Colin talks about why Jimmy G's games are so unusual (3:00), the "painful" performance from Carson Wentz (6:00), the weekend coach firings and approaching Black Monday (8:00), what this season exposed about the Giants organization (10:00), and what he's heard about Russell Wilson's future with the Seahawks (11:00). Then, Tyler Dunne - founder of the Go Long newsletter - and Colin discuss Aaron Rodgers' beef over MVP voting (14:00), if Rodgers needs another Super Bowl to cement his legacy (17:00), the reason this Packers team is different from past ones (25:00), what the Green Bay media really thinks of Rodgers (28:00), the drastic moves the Vikings need to make (30:00), the best move for both Russell Wilson and the Seahawks (32:00), and the sleeper team that could stop the Packers (34:00).  

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
